articles.description: Its CASA ratio in Q3 stood at 29.9% and CET 1 ratio was at 13%. Yes Bank said its total assets rose 13% YoY to Rs 343,798 crore while non-interest income rose 56% to Rs 1,143 crore. The size of the total balance sheet grew 12.9% YoY and 2.8% QoQ to Rs 343,798…

articles.title: Reliance Industries Q3 results impact: Should you buy, sell or hold the stock? - Economic Times
articles.description: O2C was the key driver for the earnings beat (QoQ O2C EBITDA +16%) and in our view, O2C (Refining, Petrochem) and E&P should remain the key earnings drivers in CY23 as consumer business growth slows down,  said JP Morgan's Pinakin Parekh.

articles.title: Top 10 trading ideas for next 3-4 weeks, backed by upbeat earnings, Budget optimism - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Experts feel the 17,800-18,200 range is expected to break on either side after the announcement of the Budget, hence, if the Nifty breaks 18,200, then 18,500 is the level to watch out for
articles.content:

articles.title: Why internet growth has stalled in India - BBC
articles.description: Rising smartphone prices have led to internet growth slowing in the world's second-largest mobile market.
articles.content:
With more than a billion users, India boasts the world's second largest mobile phone market.
Yet, internet growth in this vast market appears to have stalled.

articles.author: Kiran Rathee
articles.title: iPhone Apple of India's eye, hits $1 billion exports mark in December - Economic Times
articles.description: Apple and Samsung have been the leading players for exporting mobile phones from India. As per government officials, Apple overtook Samsung to become the leading mobile phone exporter in November and achieved the $1 billion mobile phone exports in December.
articles.content: New Delhi: Apple has become the first company from India to export smartphones worth $1 billion (8,100 crore) in a month, meeting the milestone in December 2022, according to data available with ET.D… [+3392 chars]
